translation.en: [man over PA] Welcome to the store. Are you a Busy Beaver?
translation.zh: 欢迎光临 您是忙碌的河狸吗？

translation.en: [Otto] No, I am not a Busy Beaver.
Join our rewards club for savings.
translation.zh: 加入会员即可享用折扣

translation.en: You can get your teeth into our dam good deals.
translation.zh: 购买本店提供的优惠商品

translation.en: If you need help, ask a Beaver.
translation.zh: 需要协助请向店员咨询

translation.en: Hey. Oh. Can I, uh, help you with that, sir?
Do you think I don't know how to cut rope?
No, it's just we usually do that for ya.
translation.zh: 不是 只是通常都由店员服务

translation.en: Do you think I'm gonna cut myself and bleed all over your floor and sue you?
translation.zh: 你觉得我会割伤自己 然后告你们？

translation.en: Then I don't need your help.
Did you, um, find everything you were lookin' for today?
translation.zh: 您需要的东西都找到了吗？

translation.en: You charged me for 6 feet of rope.
I didn't get 2 yards. I got 5 feet.
translation.zh: 我没拿2码 只拿了5英尺

translation.en: Yeah, we don't charge by the foot. We charge by the yard.
translation.zh: 我们不是以尺计价 是以码计价

translation.en: 99¢ a yard is 33¢ a foot, times 5, that's 1.65.
translation.zh: 1码99美分 1英尺就是33美分 乘以5是1美元65美分

translation.en: No, I know, but I can't put it into the computer the way that you just said.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我不能把你说的算法 输入电脑

translation.en: What the hell kind of computer can't do simple math?
translation.zh: 哪种电脑不会简单的算术？

translation.en: -Can I speak to your manager? -He's at lunch.
Lunch. All anyone cares about these days is lunch.
translation.zh: 吃午餐 这年头大家只在乎吃吃吃

translation.en: -Is there anyone else in charge? -You want the assistant manager?
This is the assistant manager? How old is she?
Shouldn't you be in gym class?
translation.zh: 你不是该去上体育课吗？

translation.en: Let me cover that extra 33¢ for you.
translation.zh: 我替你付多出来的33美分

translation.en: Sir, I do not want your 33¢. And this is not about 33¢.
translation.zh: 先生 我不要你的33美分这不是33美分的事

translation.en: This is about the fact that I got 5 feet of rope because I want 5 feet of rope.
translation.zh: 重点是 我买5英尺长的绳子因为我只要5英尺长的绳子

translation.en: And I shouldn't have to pay for 6 feet of rope if I don't want 6 feet.
translation.zh: 不应该付6英尺长绳子的钱因为我不要6英尺长的绳子

translation.en: Did you want another foot of rope?
translation.zh: 你想再加一英尺的绳子吗？
（如果你不住在这里就不要把垃圾丢在这里） 自行车应该放在这里

translation.en: -It belongs in the bike rack. -I was only gone half a minute.
translation.zh: -应该停在自行车架里-我就走开了一小会儿

translation.en: Next time, I'll lock it up in the lost and found.
translation.zh: 下次我会把它锁进失物招领室

translation.en: Don't you dare let that little rat dog piss on my walkway again.
translation.zh: 再让那丑八怪死狗尿在我门口试试

translation.en: -I know it was you. -Ignore him, Prince.
translation.zh: -我知道是你-别理他 王子

translation.en: He's a nasty, bitter old man. And he has no idea who's doing that.
translation.zh: 他是个满肚子怨气的糟老头 他根本不知道是谁尿的

translation.en: Well, it was one of you.
And tell that useless boyfriend of yours to stop stretching his groin in public.
translation.zh: 叫你那废柴男友别在大庭广众下展胯献宝

translation.en: Looks like a 14-year-old Romanian gymnast, for God's sakes.
translation.zh: 搞得自己像14岁的罗马尼亚体操选手

translation.en: [man] There he is, the big man himself.
It's, well, retirement cake, I guess. Call it what you like.
translation.zh: 退休蛋糕 庆祝你退休
（辛普森钢筋公司向奥托致敬玩得开心）

translation.en: Have fun with the rest of your life. We wanted to, you know...
translation.zh: 下半辈子玩得开心啊 我们想…

translation.en: Yes! Well, no. Give you a nice send-off.
translation.zh: 对啊 不 只是欢送你

translation.en: You're the one who decided to leave.
And you did get a nice severance package.
translation.zh: 你也拿到了可观的离职补偿

translation.en: You took me off Operations. You cut back on my hours.
translation.zh: 你把我从营运部调走 削减我的工时

translation.en: You made Terry, who I trained, my supervisor.
translation.zh: 把我训练的泰瑞升为我的主管

translation.en: Terry, who can barely figure out what year it is without his phone.
translation.zh: 泰瑞没有手机就不知道何年何月

translation.en: So, yes, I took the severance package.
translation.zh: 所以我是拿了离职补偿

translation.en: I'm sorry you see it that way.
We all had to adjust after the merger.
translation.zh: 并购之后大家都得调适

translation.en: But you've been quite an asset to this company over the years, so--
translation.zh: 但你这些年来对公司贡献良多
是真的 你非常可靠

translation.en: We're gonna miss those schedules of yours.
translation.zh: 我们会怀念你订的进度表

translation.en: Okay, Otto. Want a piece of your face?
translation.zh: 奥托 要吃一块你的脸吗？

translation.en: No, no, no. Hey, you cannot use this road without a permit.
translation.zh: 不 你没有许可证 不能把车开进来

translation.en: I'm not parking. I just dropped off a package.
translation.zh: 我没停车 只是来送一个包裹

translation.en: The sign doesn't say anything about packages, does it?
translation.zh: 指示牌上没说可以送包裹吧？

translation.en: It says "permits" and you don't have one.
translation.zh: 上面说需要许可证 你没有许可证

translation.en: This is not a through street.
Every time you come in here
that means one of the residents can't park in front of their homes!
translation.zh: 就代表有个住户不能在家门口停车

translation.en: The other guys don't do this. The guys with the white trucks.
translation.zh: 别人不会这样 开白卡车的都很乖

translation.en: How come it's always you brown guys?
translation.zh: 怎么你们棕色的都乱来？

translation.en: And I don't mean that racially!
[woman's voice] Oh, hi. Sorry, can you hear me? Yes.
I have great news about your health insurance.
translation.zh: 我有关于医疗保险的好消息

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. Robot, robot, robot!
Well, who do I have to talk to to get this phone number disconnected?
translation.zh: 我想停用这个电话 该找谁？

translation.en: Can you transfer me or should I press a number?
translation.zh: 你帮我转接还是我要按哪个号码？

translation.en: Well, I have been listening to that music for seven minutes.
translation.zh: 我听那段音乐七分钟了
很抱歉 安德森先生

translation.en: I would like the electricity shut off at this residence.
-Are you moving home? -No, I am canceling the account.
translation.zh: -您要搬家？-不 我要取消账户

translation.en: And why can't you refund me for the six days?
Well, my policy is that if I'm going to pay for six days of gas,
translation.zh: 我的规定是多付六天煤气费

translation.en: then I will use six days of gas.
[in English] Go, go, go. Stop. Go.
Back. You're in the blind spot, be careful. Use the Force.
translation.zh: 倒车 你看不到 小心点 用原力

translation.en: Good, good. No, you're going on the sidewalk.
translation.zh: -噢 不行-你会开上人行道

translation.en: What the hell is he doing?
[in English] Yes! Exactly! That's exactly what I was saying.
translation.zh: 没错 我也是这么说的

translation.en: -Hey, you can't just drive here. -[radar beeping, then stops]
I'm not driving. Am I driving the car? No.
translation.zh: 我没开车 我在开车吗？

translation.en: You can't just bring a car on this street without a permit.
translation.zh: 没有许可证不能开车进来

translation.en: No, we have a parking permit. Right here. See?
translation.zh: 我们有停车许可证 这里 瞧？

translation.en: What the hell's it doing in your pocket?!
translation.zh: 你把它放在口袋里干嘛？

translation.en: That doesn't mean you can back the trailer up to your front door.
translation.zh: 那也不代表 你可以把拖车停在门口

translation.en: No, I wasn't. I was, uh, parallel parking.
translation.zh: 其实我只是想路边停车

translation.en: Yeah, that, uh, didn't go so well, huh?
translation.zh: 我停得不是很好 对吧？

translation.en: I'll just give it another try.
[Marisol in English] Keep backing away. Keep backing away.
[in English] The other way, but first the other way.
translation.zh: -另一边 先往另一边-小心点

translation.en: -No, no, no! Stop! Stop, stop, stop! Stop! -[yelling]
-Stop! Stop. Get outta the car. -[engine turns off]
How you could make it this far through life
without knowing how to back up a trailer.
My God, a dog with one front paw and cataracts coulda done better than that.
translation.zh: 老天爷 就连只有一只脚的狗 都能停得比你好

translation.en: And an automatic, of course. Give me the keys.
translation.zh: 而且是自动挡的车 给我钥匙

translation.en: The trailer's too close to the side of the car.
That's why it's still beeping, but--
[in English] Oh, that was good, huh?
He just did it in one shot, huh?
Anyone who thinks they need to use radar to back up a car
translation.zh: 需要靠雷达才会倒车的人

translation.en: shouldn't be allowed to drive one.
They shouldn't be allowed to use the radio.
And the permit goes on the rearview mirror. Not in your pocket!
translation.zh: 许可证要挂在后视镜上 不是放在口袋里

translation.en: -Bye! Thank you! -Thank you, sir. That was very nice.
translation.zh: -再见 谢谢你-谢谢 你真好心
乖女儿 东西要拿好

translation.en: [Sonya] How much more shelf space is left?
-How many more boxes of books do you have? -[Sonya] Seven or eight.
[young Otto] Then I'll build you another bookcase.
Yeah, that's what I said. No? What did I say--?
translation.zh: 我就是这么说的 不是吗？

translation.en: It doesn't matter what you said. Otto. O-T-T-O.
translation.zh: 那不重要 是奥托 奥-托

translation.en: Otto. Okay, so it's the same forward that is backwards.
translation.zh: 哦 欧托 正反的拼法都一样

translation.en: It's just you don't hear that name very often.
Okay. If we're interrupting, we can always come back.
translation.zh: 好吧 要是你在忙 我们回头再来

translation.en: That's why we go so well together.
translation.zh: 所以我们才会这么和谐

translation.en: She loves to cook, and I like to eat everything.
translation.zh: 她喜欢下厨 我喜欢吃

translation.en: We wanted to properly introduce ourselves
because we're gonna be neighbors and everything, so...
translation.zh: 因为我们会是邻居 所以…

translation.en: -I'd say you're a little unfriendly. -I'm not unfriendly.

translation.zh: 没有？好 你不会不友好

translation.en: No, no, no, no. You're not unfriendly.
translation.zh: 没有 你一点都不会不友好

translation.en: Every word you say is like a warm cuddle. It really is.
translation.zh: 你说的每句话都热情如火 是真的

translation.en: Be careful with the salsa, please.
It's, um, pollo con mole. It's really good.
translation.zh: 那是巧克力酱炖鸡 很好吃的

translation.en: It's a Mexican dish. I'm Mexican. [speaks in Spanish]
translation.zh: 那是墨西哥菜 我是墨西哥人

translation.en: [in English] I was born in El Salvador because my father is from there.
translation.zh: 我在萨尔瓦多出生 我爸是那里人

translation.en: But my mom is Mexican, so we went to first Mexico and then--
translation.zh: 但我妈是墨西哥人所以我们先去墨西哥 然后…

translation.en: Okay, well, I have some things I need to do.

translation.zh: 不好意思 奥托先生

translation.en: You wouldn't have an Alvin wrench I could borrow, would you?
translation.zh: 我能向你借万用扳手吗？

translation.en: It's "Allen" wrench, right? It's Allen wrench.
translation.zh: 通用扳手 对吧？是通用扳手
他一早上都在说万用扳手
亲爱的 就是万用扳手 相信我

translation.en: Everybody else I know calls it an Alvin wrench.
translation.zh: 我认识的所有人都说是万用扳手

translation.en: -Everybody else you know is wrong. -Oh, yeah? You wanna Google it?
translation.zh: 你认识的那些人都说错了
-你要上网查吗？-天啊 查谷歌 维基百料

translation.en: No, my phone. You use your phone.
translation.zh: 别用我的手机 用你的手机

translation.en: Do you know what size you need?
We go because you have things to do, so...
translation.zh: 你有事要做 我们先走了

translation.en: That's a Chevy engine for you.
Not enough you can depend on in this world.
translation.zh: 这世上可靠的东西并不多

translation.en: Maybe I should just run myself over with a car. That'll work.
translation.zh: 也许我应该开车撞死自己 那会有用

translation.en: Found some of the flowers you like.
I'm sorry I didn't get 'em here earlier.
Didn't even know an Allen wrench from one of the Chipmunks.
I know, I know. Maybe they can't afford to buy yet.
translation.zh: （索妮娅） 我知道 也许他们还买不起房子

translation.en: But what will they do when those real estate bastards
translation.zh: 但是如果那些可恶的房地产商

translation.en: decide to tear down their house
translation.zh: 决定拆掉他们的房子 改建廉价公寓该怎么办？

translation.en: and put up more of those ricky-ticky condos, huh?
translation.zh: 改建廉价公寓该怎么办？

translation.en: It's gonna happen. I promise you.
They're already driving around the gates, driving right across the grass.
translation.zh: 他们已经在铁门附近乱开车还开上草地

translation.en: What idiot thought that was a good name for a real estate company?
translation.zh: 哪个白痴房地产公司会取这种名字？
听起来像是“垂死的美国”

translation.en: Can't even buy a decent screw hook anymore.
translation.zh: 连像样的挂钩都买不到了

translation.en: Nothing works when you're not home.
I suspect you have hypertrophic cardiomyopathy,
translation.zh: 我怀疑你有肥厚性心肌症

translation.en: which is a genetic enlargement of the--
Well, you'll likely be around a good long time,
but I'm afraid your military prospects end here.
One return ticket to Pittsburgh, please.
Miss, you dropped your book! Hey!
-Yes. I saw you dropped it, so I... -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 是的 我看到你掉了 所以就… （《大师与玛格丽特》）

translation.en: I'm halfway through reading it. I would hate not knowing how it ends.
translation.zh: 我看到一半 如果不知道结局我肯定会很难受

translation.en: Oh, here. Why don't you join me?
I'm Otto. It was my father's name.
translation.zh: 我是奥托 那是我爸的名字

translation.en: I'm on my way to visit my father right now.
Do you take this train a lot?
Oh, no, I had to come into town for my Army physical.
translation.zh: 没有 我只是来做兵役体检

translation.en: Oh, that must be so hard, not knowing what you're gonna face over there.
translation.zh: 不知道到那以后会遇到什么情况你心里肯定很难受吧
你什么时候走？ 我没有…

translation.en: I'm afraid you're on the wrong train. This is an eastbound ticket.
translation.zh: 你搭错火车了 这是东向车票

translation.en: I'll get off at the next station.
There you go. Thank you. Have a good day.
translation.zh: 拿去 谢谢 祝你愉快
留着吧 那代表好运

translation.en: Hey, Otto! A little late for your morning rounds, isn't it?
translation.zh: 奥托 清晨巡逻有点晚吧

translation.en: No? Aren't you supposed to be at work?
translation.zh: 不会？你不是该去上班吗？

translation.en: Oh. Cool. You wanna come over for lunch, then?
translation.zh: 太好了 要过来吃午饭吗？
太好了 要过来吃午饭吗？ 午饭

translation.en: Well, it's pork tenderloin, in case you change your mind!
translation.zh: 如果你改主意了 今天吃猪里脊肉

translation.en: This is a private road, and these gates are to keep down the flow of traffic.
translation.zh: 这是私人道路 铁门是用来减少车流

translation.en: Not so idiot drivers can go around them and tear up the grass.
translation.zh: 不是让白痴驾驶把车开上草地

translation.en: -[music stops] -Okay. You got me. I'm with Dye & Merika.
translation.zh: 被你逮到了 我是戴恩美利卡的员工

translation.en: I'm gonna have the groundskeeper come down and fix that up for ya, okay?
translation.zh: 我会请管理员来帮你修好

translation.en: Good as new. Even better. You have a good one now, okay?
translation.zh: 比新的更好 祝你愉快

translation.en: The rules are here for a reason.
I know what you guys are up to.
Okay, Mr. Anderson. Whatever you say.
translation.zh: 好吧 安德森先生 你说了算

translation.en: -[dog barking] -Get out here, you little bugger! [grunts]
translation.zh: 快出来 你这小家伙
你敢再丢一块石头 我就会

translation.en: and I swear I'll dropkick that little rat dog of yours right over the roof.
translation.zh: 你敢再丢一块石头 我就会 把你的臭狗踢到屋顶

translation.en: No, I'm not throwing it at your house. That nasty cat scratched Prince.
translation.zh: 我不是朝你家丢石头那只猫抓伤王子

translation.en: I'm gonna kill that piece of shit.
[Barb] What do you care? It's feral.
translation.zh: 关你什么事？那是只野猫

translation.en: It's probably full of all sorts of disgusting diseases.
So are you, most likely. I don't throw rocks at you.
translation.zh: 你也一样 但我不会向你丢石头

translation.en: -[Andy] What's up? -Did you hear what he just said this time?
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 你听到他这次怎么说我的吗？

translation.en: [Barb] I told you before about how he talks to me.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过他总是对我阴阳怪气

translation.en: Get outta here while you can.
[Barb] Dye & Merika said they'll get all the old people on this street into a home.
translation.zh: 地产开发商说要把这条街上的老人都送到养老院

translation.en: [in English] I just wanted to bring the wrenches back.
-I found one that came with the furniture. -Congratulations.
translation.zh: 我找到家具附送的扳手 恭喜了

translation.en: And I made you some salpores de arroz.
No. These are Salvadoran cookies. They were my father's favorite, so...
translation.zh: 不是 这是萨尔瓦多饼干 我爸的最爱
很美味 你一定会很喜欢
对啊 因为是我做的

translation.en: Also, Otto, I was wondering if you have a ladder I can borrow.
translation.zh: 另外 奥托不知道你有没有梯子可以借我

translation.en: Why do you need a ladder?
Well, it's the one up there.
And you're gonna try to open it from the outside?
I like how his hands are waving.
Uh, Otto, hate to bother you, but, um, we don't have any heat.
translation.zh: 奥托 打扰一下 我们的暖气坏了

translation.en: Could you come take a look?
How would I go about that?
Well, it's hard to tell the difference sometimes with Otto.
translation.zh: 在奥托身上 有时候很难看得出区别

translation.en: By the way, we, uh, just moved to 206.
translation.zh: 对了 我们才刚搬进206号
-欢迎 亲爱的-幸会了 我是安妮塔

translation.en: I'm Anita. My husband, Reuben, is the one who used to handle the heat.
translation.zh: 我老公鲁本以前负责处理暖气

translation.en: -Okay. -But we always knew a day would come
when he wouldn't be able to handle things around the house any longer.
translation.zh: 但我们知道总有一天 他会没办法处理这些事情

translation.en: Maybe Reuben should have thought of that when he organized his coup.
translation.zh: 鲁本把我踢出管委会时应该先想到

translation.en: That was a long time ago.
Otto, can't you just go breathe Anita's radiators for her?
translation.zh: 奥托 快去帮安妮塔替散热器排气

translation.en: No. Because you don't breathe radiators.
translation.zh: 不 不能替散热器排气

translation.en: -Honey, look at this ramp. -[Anita] That's Sonya's.
translation.zh: -看看这块活动坡道-那是索妮娅的

translation.en: -This is what we needed for the trailer. -Put that down.
Put that down! Who said you could touch that?!
-[Tommy] Sorry. -All of you get outta here. Go, go.
Take your ladder and go. Get outta here. All of you.
translation.zh: 拿了梯子就滚 全都给我滚

translation.en: No. What are you doing in here?
translation.zh: 不行 你在这里干嘛？

translation.en: How did you get in here? Come on.
Come on. Go! Get outta there.
No, get out. Get out of there.
translation.zh: 不行 出去 快出去

translation.en: You scratch me, I'll bite you.
translation.zh: 你敢抓伤我 我就咬你

translation.en: I loaned you my garden hose last August.
translation.zh: 我去年八月借水管给你

translation.en: If you give it back to me, I'll bleed your radiators for you.
translation.zh: 只要还给我 我就帮你替暖气排水

translation.en: So those new neighbors of yours, they seem quite lovely, don't you think?
translation.zh: 你的新邻居看起来人很好 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, well, you may have some more new neighbors soon enough.
translation.zh: 你可能很快就会有更多邻居了

translation.en: The realty people, they've been telling us...
Reuben and I have to move out.
No, that's a load of crap.
They don't own this house. You do.
translation.zh: 这房子不是他们的 是你们的

translation.en: Yeah, well, that's what I said.
They, uh, have been talking to our boy, Chris.
translation.zh: 他们找上我们的儿子克里斯

translation.en: Now he's saying that I can no longer take care of Reuben,
that he needs to be in a special care place.
translation.zh: 必须把他送去护理之家

translation.en: And I should move into a retirement home.
What does Chris know about it? He's an idiot. He always has been.

I like knowing how things work.
translation.zh: 我想知道东西怎么运作

translation.en: I like knowing how things work.

translation.en: What each part does to make a car run smoothly.

translation.en: It's more complicated than people realize.

translation.en: A carburetor has to mix gas and air in just the right combination,

translation.en: and then the spark plug has to ignite that mixture,
which drives the piston and the connecting rods and the drive shaft--

translation.en: It's all we really talked about. He was a good dad.

translation.en: Just how it felt when she was gone.

translation.en: Why didn't you get an entrée?
So you could order whatever you wanted.

-What are you doing here? -What are you doing?
-I'm looking for you. -Well, you found me.

Tommy fell off the ladder, and the ambulance just took him away.

translation.en: Well, you can drive yourself in that imported toaster you call a car.

I just never got to the other parts.

专心点！ 拜托听我说！

translation.en: -I will drive you to the hospital. -Thank you.
I'm going to get the children!
[Luna] Pick me up, pick me up!

'Are you there, Baby Bear?' Mr. Bear says.

'Are you there, Baby Bear, up in that tree?'"

不是 那是一只猫头鹰！

translation.zh: “‘这里没有别人 只有宝宝和我’

translation.en: 'Are you there, Baby Bear, deep underground?'"
-Do you want to see a trick? -Yes!
Actually, I was reading to them.

It was all the clown's fault.

Look. I gave you a quarter that I said I needed back.

-The ol' switcheroo. -You gave me this quarter.
Is Otto going to get in trouble?

不行 它身上有虫 奥托

You are not putting that cat in my oven.

Oh, hey, who's gonna look after this guy?

-[man] Come on. -[woman] Film it, film it, film it.
-Get the shot. -I have him. I see him.

translation.en: -Tell me what happened. -We were going to the museum...

先生 你救了他的命
-随便啦 关注我们-关注我们

你是安德森先生 对吧？

-再见 妈妈-再见 乖女儿

I'm teaching you how to drive. Get in.

translation.en: Now, coming up on the red light. You're going to have to stop.

Put in the brake, I put the clutch.
Clutch and brake. And now brake.

translation.en: -[in English] Don't shout at me. -I am not shouting at you.

Clutch in, and brake. Brake. Brake. Brake.

-Just wait for the green light. -[rock music blaring over SUV speakers]
And here we go. So press in on the clutch.
And give it a little gas.
Slowly let out on the clu--
Press in on the clutch, shift into fi-- You don't have to turn the key.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. [speaks in Spanish] -Press in on the--

translation.en: -then press the gas. -I can't do this.

translation.en: -That is all you have to do. -I can't do this.
Did you not have to learn how to drive?
Calm down, old man. Hey, hey.

translation.en: I'm not your old man! You son of a bitch!
If you honk that horn one more time,
it'll be the last thing you do. You hear me? Huh?

translation.en: You have given birth to two children. Soon it'll be three.
translation.zh: 你生过两个小孩 就快生第三个

translation.en: You have come here from a country very far away.
translation.zh: 你从很远的国家来到这里

translation.en: you got yourself an education and a nitwit husband

translation.en: and you are holding that family together.
translation.zh: 你把全家照顾得好好的

translation.en: You will have no problem learning how to drive.
My God, the world is full of complete idiots

translation.en: who have managed to figure it out, and you are not a complete idiot.
translation.zh: 都能学会开车 你又不是白痴

translation.en: [Otto] Okay, there's a spot right there. Just pull up, parallel,

translation.en: Back up all the way up to the curb.
How did you find this place?
We used to come here every Saturday at 1:00.
translation.zh: 我们以前每周六下午一点都会来

translation.en: I'd wash and wax the car,
and she would grade her papers and cook and spend the rest of the day reading.
translation.zh: 她会改考卷 做饭 然后看一整天的书

translation.en: I tried to read some of them, but...
Her friends said that we were like night and day.
translation.zh: 她朋友说我们天差地别

translation.en: My life was black-and-white before I met Sonya.
translation.zh: 我遇见索妮娅之前的人生是黑白的

translation.en: She was a force of nature.
She convinced the school to start up a program
translation.zh: 说服学校为需要辅导的学生

translation.en: for the kids that needed extra help.
A lot of kids had problems at home or, uh, social anxieties.
translation.zh: 很多孩子家庭有问题或是不善于社交

translation.en: But by the time Sonya was done with 'em, they were reciting Shakespeare.
translation.zh: 但经过索妮娅的辅导他们都会吟诵莎士比亚的作品

translation.en: I ran into one of her students,
[Otto] We all got along fine, of course, when we first moved in.
translation.zh: 我们刚搬去的时候相处得很融洽
-嗨 我是索妮娅-我是安妮塔

translation.en: [Otto] Sonya and Anita were best friends.
translation.zh: 索妮娅和安妮塔是闺蜜

translation.en: [young Otto] So I got my Allen keys...
And Reuben and I were a lot alike.

translation.zh: 世事无常 我们越来越疏远

translation.en: They build walls. They take offense.
translation.zh: 筑起心墙 他们不高兴

translation.en: Maybe it was all the construction that drove everybody crazy.
translation.zh: 也许开发商一直盖房子把大家逼疯

translation.en: You know, there used to be a forest up on that hill.
translation.zh: 那个山丘上本来有一座树林

translation.en: That's why they call it Birchwood.
Then they started building all those condos and cut down all the birches.
translation.zh: 后来他们加盖公寓 砍光桦木

translation.en: They didn't even realize what they were doing until we told them,
translation.zh: 我们开始抗议他们才知道做了什么

translation.en: But this was before the coup?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah. Reuben and I were friends then.
translation.zh: 对啊 我和鲁本当时还是朋友

translation.en: After that, all we saw were the differences.
A few years later, their son, Chris, he, uh, took a job in Japan,

translation.en: and I don't think he's been back to visit them since.
translation.zh: 后来他再也没回来看他们

translation.en: -Oh. -Reuben and he never did get along.
Anyway, that's when I decided to bury the hatchet.
translation.zh: 于是我就决定放下前嫌

translation.en: Sonya gave me this a while back.
translation.zh: 前阵子索妮娅给我这瓶酒

translation.en: I thought maybe we could start fresh.
Hey, would you like to see my new car?
You gotta change with the times.
I don't know what went wrong with Reuben, but that's when I knew I'd lost him.
translation.zh: 我不知道他是怎么了 但我失去了他

translation.en: I mean, a man has to stand up for what he believes in.
Even if it is an F-O-R-D.
And you and Sonya, did you ever think about having children?
translation.zh: 你和索妮娅当时想过要小孩吗？

translation.en: I was wondering if you could help us out tonight.
Me and Tommy don't get a lot of time to go out for dinner
translation.zh: 我和汤米在宝宝出生前

translation.en: I'm not gonna drive you two around on a date.
translation.zh: 我才不会载你们去约会

translation.en: No. We're gonna take a cab.
translation.zh: 不用 我们会叫出租车

translation.en: What do you need me for, then?
-Mama, I did not! Why would I? -Yes, you did!
translation.zh: 妈 我没拿！ 才怪！还给我！
才怪！还给我！ -来抓我啊-够了 别再吵了
-来抓我啊-够了 别再吵了

translation.en: [in English] And learn to share your everything.
[in English] No. Don't be silly. It's gonna be very fun.
translation.zh: 别傻了 这会很好玩

translation.en: If you remember, Abbie has to be in bed by 9:00, okay?
translation.zh: 请记住 艾比九点得上床

translation.en: I'm setting it to "Armed Stay." Are you paying attention?
translation.zh: 我要设定为防盗模式 你有在专心看吗？

translation.en: So if you wanna go out,
translation.zh: 你想出去只要按这个按钮

translation.en: you just have to press this button here, and it's disalarmed.
translation.zh: 你想出去只要按这个按钮 就能解除警报器

translation.en: [Marisol] Be good to Abuelo Otto please, okay? [Abbie] We will!
I don't see chocolate milk in here.
You make it with the syrup. But not too much. It'll keep her awake.
translation.zh: 要加巧克力酱 但加太多她会睡不着

translation.en: Dad said he wanted to throw it out the window,
translation.zh: 爸爸说他想把它丢出窗户

translation.en: but Mom said Dad isn't allowed to open windows anymore.
translation.zh: 但妈妈说爸爸不准再开窗户

translation.en: [Otto] I don't think this is a good idea.
Because no one stands a chance against a luchadoro.
translation.zh: 因为没人打得赢摔角手
等等 是他先打人的

translation.en: Rub it and smack! Smack! Karate chop!

translation.zh: （加州大学 玛丽索曼德兹）

translation.en: [in English] Wow, it's awfully quiet, huh?
-Fine. -You did a good job tonight, Otto.
translation.zh: 很好啊 你今晚做得很棒 奥托

translation.en: You should pat yourself on the back.
You can't hear your chain rattle when you switch gears like that?
translation.zh: 换挡的时候听不到落链声吗？

translation.en: -My bike's getting old. -Don't blame the bike.
You just have to adjust your derailleur.
I'm, um, looking for Otto Anderson.
Are you sure you wanna do that?

translation.zh: 太棒了 真是不可思议

translation.en: You treat it right, it'll treat you right.
translation.zh: 好好对待它 它会让你骑得很顺

translation.en: I can't believe I'm helping you throw crap onto people's lawns.
translation.zh: 我竟然帮你往别人家的草坪上丢垃圾

translation.en: I'm saving up for a car.
Young lady, you're blocking the garage.
translation.zh: 小姐 你挡住车库了

translation.en: Mr. Anderson? My name is Shari Kenzie.
translation.zh: 安德森先生？我是雪莉肯锡

translation.en: I'm a social media journalist, and I--
translation.zh: 我是社交媒体记者 我…

translation.en: I have an online series called Everyday Heroes.
translation.zh: 我有个网络节目叫《日常英雄》

translation.en: What you did the other day at the train station was amazing.
translation.zh: 你那天在火车站真的很勇敢

translation.en: No, I don't. I've watched the video at least a dozen times.
translation.zh: 没有 我看了那个视频十几遍了

translation.en: Oh. A commuter recorded what happened on their phone and posted it online.
translation.zh: 有个通勤的人拍下来并上传到网上

translation.en: Someone in the comments recognized you. That's how I tracked you down.
translation.zh: 留言区有人认得你 我这才找到你

translation.en: It's gotten over a million views.
translation.zh: 视频有一百多万人次观看

translation.en: Why can't people mind their own business?
translation.zh: 他们为什么要多管闲事？

translation.en: Because stories like yours are inspiring.
translation.zh: 因为你的故事激励人心

translation.en: If I could just talk to you for a few minutes--
No, now I've got too many things I have to do.
translation.zh: 不行 我有太多事情要做

translation.en: I recorded a video message from the man you saved.
translation.zh: 我为你救的人录了一个视频

translation.en: -Um... just pull it up. -[Marisol] Otto! Hi!
-So you ready for another driving lesson? -[pounding on garage door]
[Shari] Hello? Hello? Hey, I'm still in here!
Turn the knob, open the door.
-[speaks in Spanish] -Opened a door before, haven't you?
Good. I'm not through with my rounds.
translation.zh: 很好 我还没巡逻完

translation.en: What the hell does that even mean?
Buncha knotheads pointin' a camera at themselves.
translation.zh: 一群笨蛋拿着手机自拍

translation.en: I thought you handled it really well.
I mean, closing her in your garage.
Otto, also, I was thinking you've done so much for us.
translation.zh: 奥托 我在想 你帮了我们这么多

translation.en: -I wanna do something for you too. -I don't need anything.
Well, I think you could do with some decent food. Sometimes. No?
translation.zh: 你可以吃好一点 有时候

translation.en: Those are not bad. They're not bad.
translation.zh: 那些不错吃 还不错

translation.en: that I can help you clean out your house and clean out the front hall in your home,
translation.zh: 我可以帮你清理屋子和前厅

translation.en: and help you pack the coats and shoes you have there of Sonya's.
translation.zh: 帮你打包索妮娅的大衣和鞋子

translation.en: No, but it can help you move on.
translation.zh: 没错 但这能帮你走出来

translation.en: She's always gonna be with you.
When my father died, my mother, she stopped living.
translation.zh: 我爸死后 我妈就放弃了生活

translation.en: -She just stopped like she used-- -Stop talking!
Why can't people mind their own business? Idiots.
translation.zh: 为什么要多管闲事？ 白痴

translation.en: The more they babble, the more they drown out the memory of her voice.
translation.zh: 他们一直喋喋不休盖过我对她的回忆

translation.en: I don't want to clear Sonya from my life.
translation.zh: 我不想把索妮娅赶出我的生命

translation.en: There was nothing before her, and there's nothing after!
translation.zh: 我本来一无所有 她走后更是如此

translation.en: Stop right there. You stop that car!
Did you leave that gate open? You left that gate open, didn't you?
You're the only one who gives a damn.
I give a damn about people following the rules.
Yes, I know. I know all about you.
There's a file on you at the office. It's this thick.
translation.zh: 你在办公室的档案很厚

translation.en: I know about your wife. How you blame whatever happened to her on everybody else.
translation.zh: 我知道你老婆的事 你怪每个人…

translation.en: Don't you say one more word. [gasping]
Take it easy, Otto. Look, I'm not trying to upset you,
translation.zh: 别激动 奥托 我不想惹你生气

translation.en: but you really shouldn't be living alone.
I mean, we know more about you than you probably realize, so...
translation.zh: 我们比你想象的更了解你 所以…

translation.en: Just look after that heart of yours, okay?
translation.zh: 照顾好你的心脏 好吗？

translation.en: What do you know about my heart?
translation.zh: 你对我的心脏了解多少？

translation.en: Hey, what do you know about my heart?!
translation.zh: 你对我的心脏了解多少？

translation.en: Otto, what's going on? Are you okay? Do you feel okay?
You wanna help me, close the gate.
translation.zh: 想帮我的话就关上铁门
拜托跟我说话 奥托

translation.en: There you are. ♪ Of all the things we should've said That we never said ♪
But now we have to live.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to--
The generator blew and the power is out.
translation.zh: 发电机坏了 停电了

translation.en: I was hoping you might let me crash on your couch for the night.
translation.zh: 我想请你让我睡你沙发

translation.en: There's a sofa you can use.
Don't go into the dining room. The ceiling needs repair.
translation.zh: 别去餐厅 天花板需要修理

translation.en: It's upstairs in Sonya's old study.
translation.zh: 就在楼上索妮娅以前的书房

translation.en: So why did he kick you out?
translation.zh: 他为什么把你踢出家门？
因为你现在是马尔坎了？
对 因为我是马尔坎

translation.en: I read too much. I don't like sports. Take your pick.
translation.zh: 我看太多书 我不爱运动 随你挑
我是跨性别人士 他觉得很丢脸

translation.en: Good morning. The power's still out
translation.zh: 早安 还在停电 我就把剩下的蛋煮完

translation.en: so I cooked up the last of the eggs while they're still good.
translation.zh: 还在停电 我就把剩下的蛋煮完 趁还没有坏

translation.en: I have to do my rounds.
Don't you at least want some coffee first?
You mind if I join you? I need to get my steps in.
translation.zh: 我能加入吗？我得多走路

translation.en: Hey, Otto, if you want to slow down, we can 'cause my beats are up.
translation.zh: 奥托 走慢一点 我的心跳太快了

translation.en: Otto, did you hear they're moving Reuben into assisted living this afternoon?
translation.zh: 你听说他们要把鲁本送去护理之家的事了吗？

translation.en: They convinced Anita to sell the house.
translation.zh: 他们说服安妮塔卖掉房子

translation.en: No, they made the deal with Chris.
translation.zh: 不 是克里斯的决定

translation.en: -Chris? He can't do that. -Yeah, he can.
translation.zh: -克里斯？他不能那么做-他可以

translation.en: After Dye & Merika found out Anita had Parkinson's,
translation.zh: 戴恩美利卡的人发现安妮塔得了帕金森氏症
就找到克里斯 然后…

translation.en: So last year Chris convinced Anita to give him power of attorney
translation.zh: 去年克里斯说服安妮塔签了授权书

translation.en: So Dye & Merika made the deal with Chris to buy the house.
translation.zh: 于是戴恩美利卡就找克里斯买下房子

translation.en: Wait, Anita found out she had Parkinson's last year?
translation.zh: 等等安妮塔去年发现自己有帕金森？

translation.en: She would've told Sonya. Sonya would've told me.
translation.zh: 她会告诉索妮娅 索妮娅会告诉我

translation.en: Well, Anita and Reuben didn't want you and Sonya to know.
translation.zh: 安妮塔和鲁本不想让你们知道

translation.en: They said you had enough on your plate as it is.
I need to see everything you ever got from Dye & Merika.
translation.zh: 我要看戴恩美利卡给你的所有文件

translation.en: Notices, letters. Do you have a copy of the power of attorney?
translation.zh: 通知 信件 你有授权书副本吗？

translation.en: How do you know about that?
And any records of Reuben's condition and yours.
translation.zh: 还有你和鲁本病情的记录

translation.en: I got so wrapped up in my own troubles, I stopped thinking of anyone else.
translation.zh: 纠结于自己的烦恼 不再替别人着想

translation.en: And I figured they weren't thinking about me.
This isn't easy to say after all this time.
And I will sort all this out.
I need to use your phone.
Why can't you use your own?
Mine is disconnected at the moment.

translation.zh: 为什么？ 不重要 我得借用你的手机

translation.en: I just need to use your phone, okay?
translation.zh: 不重要 我得借用你的手机

translation.en: You won't tell me why your phone is disconnected?
translation.zh: 你不肯说你的手机为何停用

translation.en: You won't tell me why you need to use my phone?
translation.zh: 也不肯说为何要借用我的手机

translation.en: You won't tell me what happened to you in the street yesterday?
translation.zh: 更不肯说你昨天在街上怎么了

translation.en: And then you went inside and you wouldn't even open the door?
translation.zh: 然后回家连门都不肯打开
你把我吓坏了 奥托

translation.en: Do you know how long I was out there?
translation.zh: 你知道我在门外等了多久吗？

translation.en: And I didn't know if something had happened to you.
translation.zh: 我不知道你是不是出了事

translation.en: Or if something was gonna happen to you.
And I'm sorry if I said the wrong thing about Sonya's coats.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我提到索妮娅的大衣

translation.en: But I was just trying to help.
And you left me out there.
So, no. You can't use my phone.
translation.zh: 所以你不能借用我的手机

translation.en: You think your life is so hard because everybody's an idiot
translation.zh: 你觉得人生很难 因为大家都是白痴

translation.en: and you have to do everything on your own, right?
translation.zh: 你得自己扛下所有的事 对吗？

translation.en: And I think you should just be happy
that someone was trying to help you get through a crappy day.
translation.zh: 有人想帮你度过糟糕的一天
所以… 开发商那些混蛋

translation.en: are trying to force Anita and Reuben out of their home.
translation.zh: 想把安妮塔和鲁本赶出他们家

translation.en: That's why I need to use your phone.
translation.zh: 所以我才得借用你的手机

translation.en: We had never had a vacation.
And she wanted to do something special before the baby came.
translation.zh: 她想趁宝宝出生前做点特别的

translation.en: So we booked a trip to Niagara Falls.
translation.zh: 于是我们就决定去尼加拉大瀑布

translation.en: On the way back, the bus crashed.
There'd been a recall on the brake lines,
but the company never had them fixed.

translation.zh: 索妮娅半身瘫痪 而且…

translation.en: After three months, she was finally able to come home.
translation.zh: 三个月后她终于能回家

translation.en: But they had started building the new condos
translation.zh: 但他们已经开始盖新公寓

translation.en: and the community center and the walkways,
none of which were designed for people in wheelchairs.
The builders could have changed their plans.
translation.zh: 建商大可以修改设计蓝图

translation.en: But the laws weren't in place back then, and they didn't care.
translation.zh: 但法律没这规定 他们也不在乎

translation.en: -We're putting in a new playground... -I cared.
-There's places for people like your wife. -And I was so angry.
What does that mean? People like her? What does that mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？她这种人？什么意思？

translation.en: -What're you tryin' to say?! -[yells] Get off of me!
That's when they voted me out as head of the homeowners' association.
translation.zh: 于是他们就把我踢出管委会

translation.en: I wanted to obliterate them all.
The builders, and the realtors, and the bus company, the bus driver.
translation.zh: 建造方 房地产商 客运公司和司机

translation.en: I never would have let it go...

translation.zh: 如果不是因为索妮娅的话

translation.en: Sonya said we had to keep living.
translation.zh: 索妮娅说我们必须继续生活
我为了索妮娅继续生活

translation.en: Six months ago she passed away.
I was going to join her.
That's why I had them disconnect my phone.
But now I think she wants me to keep living.
translation.zh: 但现在我觉得她要我继续活下去

translation.en: And I have things to do.

translation.zh: 你在浪费时间 奥托

translation.en: It's a done deal. Reuben's coming with us.
translation.zh: 木已成舟 鲁本要跟我们走

translation.en: And if you get in our way, I'll have you arrested.
translation.zh: 你敢挡路 我就请警察逮捕你

translation.en: -I'm not doing a thing. -Don't you take another step.
translation.zh: 我什么都没做 别再向前走一步

translation.en: You are not taking my husband away from me.
Anita, please. We're doing this for your own good.
translation.zh: 安妮塔 我们这是为你好

translation.en: What you're doing is trying to take my property.
I want Reuben to stay right here for the rest of his life,
translation.zh: 我要鲁本 留下来跟我一起… （戴恩美利卡 老人护理部）

translation.en: Okay, but who's gonna take care of Reuben when you're no longer able to?
translation.zh: 你不行了 谁会照顾鲁本？

translation.en: Who's gonna take care of you? Otto?
Otto's not in the best health either. Are you, Otto?
translation.zh: 谁会照顾你？奥托？ 奥托的身体也不行了 对吧？

translation.en: -What are you doing? Put that down. -Anita and Reuben are like family to me.
translation.zh: 你在干嘛？放下 安妮塔和鲁本就像我的家人

translation.en: I'll take care of them as long as they need.
translation.zh: 只要他们需要 我就会照顾他们

translation.en: Uh, their son, Chris, has decided they're not fit enough to be on their own,
translation.zh: 他们的儿子克里斯决定他们无法自理

translation.en: and so what we're doing is--
Excuse me. When was the last time Chris saw his parents?
translation.zh: 不好意思 克里斯上次见他父母是何时？

translation.en: He lives in Japan. They've been estranged for 10 years.
translation.zh: 他住在日本 十年没跟父母联络

translation.en: Chris would have no idea how his parents are doing,
translation.zh: 克里斯不清楚他父母的状况

translation.en: except for what you told him.

translation.zh: 除了你跟他说的 你又是谁？

translation.en: All right, all right, shut that camera off. You can't film this.
translation.zh: 够了… 关掉摄影机 不准乱拍

translation.en: You told Anita's son, Chris, that she had Parkinson's,
translation.zh: 你跟安妮塔的儿子克里斯说她得了帕金森 但…

translation.en: but Anita never told anyone about her diagnosis.
translation.zh: 你跟安妮塔的儿子克里斯说她得了帕金森 但… 她从来没说过她的诊断结果
她从来没说过她的诊断结果 你怎么会知道？

translation.en: I'd have to check the records.
Mr. Anderson over there is something of a local hero.
translation.zh: 安德森先生算是本地英雄

translation.en: He tells me you know details about his private health records as well.
translation.zh: 他说你也知道 他的私人就诊资料

translation.en: So how are you and your company
getting illegal access to the medical records of seniors?
translation.zh: 是怎么非法取得老人的病历的？

translation.en: Okay, let's go. We're done. We're done.
translation.zh: 好了 走吧 这件事结束了

translation.en: -Get that goddamn camera out of my face. -[Tommy] Goodbye.
translation.zh: 别拿手机拍我 再见

translation.en: I first uploaded Anita and Chris's story an hour ago.
translation.zh: 我一个小时前 上传安妮塔和克里斯的故事

translation.en: Already dozens of people are saying
Dye & Merika forced them out of their homes.
translation.zh: 戴恩美利卡把他们赶出自己的家

translation.en: [Shari] If you have a story, share it with me at Shari_Kenzie.
translation.zh: 如果你有故事 请和我雪莉肯锡分享

translation.en: -I got it. I got it. -[Otto laughing]
[Tommy] Hey, you forgot to shut the gate!
[Otto] You see that? He just rolled right over. Gave up.
translation.zh: 看到没？他马上举手投降

translation.en: In our day, the bastards would at least put up a fight.
translation.zh: 当年那群混蛋至少会反抗

translation.en: They haven't gotten rid of us yet.
It does feel pretty good. Doesn't it?
[Shari] Neighborly neighbors, a thing of the past?
translation.zh: 敦亲睦邻已经过时了吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm here with eyewitnesses Anita and Jimmy to find out more.
translation.zh: 敦亲睦邻已经过时了吗？ 我正在访问目击者安妮塔和吉米

translation.en: Jimmy, you mentioned that Anita and Reuben are like family to you.
translation.zh: 吉米你说安妮塔和鲁本就像你的家人

translation.en: Well, I have dinner at their house nearly every single night.
translation.zh: 我几乎每晚都去他们家吃晚饭

translation.en: I know what you're waiting for. You're ready for lunch, aren't you?
translation.zh: 我知道你在等什么 吃午饭 对吧？

translation.en: [Shari] You moved into this community recently.
translation.zh: 你们最近才搬来 感觉如何？

translation.en: -How has that been for you? -It's been beautiful.
translation.zh: 你们最近才搬来 感觉如何？ 真的很棒

translation.en: [Shari] And your family, to have people there that are--
translation.zh: 真的很棒 有这些好邻居…

translation.en: -Ms. Mendes? You can see him now. -Yes?
translation.zh: -曼德兹妻子？可以见他了-什么？

translation.en: Mr. Anderson listed you as next of kin.
translation.zh: 安德森先生把你列为最近的亲属

translation.en: Your uncle had a close call. Has he spoken to you about his condition?
translation.zh: 你叔叔有惊无险他提过他的病情吗？

translation.en: Basically, his heart is too big.
You're really bad at dying, you know that?
translation.zh: 在找死这件事上 你真的很不擅长

translation.en: [in English] Otto, I think it's time.
Oh, uh, I'm a cardiologist. I'll page OB for you.
translation.zh: 我是心脏科医生我帮你叫妇产科医生
想想办法 我要生了

translation.en: Everyone, this is our friend Otto.
translation.zh: 大伙儿 这是我们的朋友奥托

translation.en: Sorry, is this about the cars that are in front?
translation.zh: 抱歉 这是关于门口停的车吗？
不是 我带了东西给你

translation.en: I gave it a fresh coat of paint.
Thank you. Okay, hold him one second, please.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 帮我抱一下

translation.en: Hold him. Oh, he's gonna cry.
[in English] I'll be right back, bebé. Okay.
-[fussing] -Uh, should I put this thing back in him?
Uh, well, let me show you how this works.
translation.zh: 让我把你放在婴儿床上面

translation.en: You don't have to do anything.
[Otto] Sonya, this is Abbie and Luna. They have something for you.
translation.zh: 这是艾比和露娜 她们有东西给你
-嗨 索妮娅-嗨 索妮娅

translation.en: -That's, uh, brand-new little Marco there. -[speaks in Spanish]
And Marisol, Tommy. I told you about them.
translation.zh: 还有我跟你提过的玛丽索和汤米

translation.en: She loved pink flowers, girls. You chose well.
translation.zh: 她很爱粉红色的花 你们真会挑

translation.en: All right, Malcolm, check that oil. Check it.
And let's see, what does it say?

translation.zh: -好了-就这样 好了 这是使用手册
好了 这是使用手册

translation.en: -Oh, my gosh. -Saved you from a Volkswagen.
I have a car! I have a car!
-[Jimmy] This is your car! -[Malcolm] Are you kidding me?
-Let's go for a ride? -That's a nice truck, Otto.
translation.zh: -去兜风？-很棒的卡车 奥托
我喜欢你的车 奥托

translation.en: Yeah? Wait till you see how it rides.
[Abbie] This is like Otto's luchador monster truck.
translation.zh: 这就像摔角手奥托的怪兽卡车

translation.en: [Luna] Yeah. Do you have any comics?

translation.zh: 能去吃瑞典闪电泡芙吗？

translation.en: -I can't believe Marco's 3 already. -You're such a big boy.
if you're reading this, don't worry.
translation.zh: 如果你在读这封信 别担心

translation.en: It turns out having a big heart isn't as nice as it sounds.
translation.zh: 结果心太大了并没有听起来的那么好

translation.en: The doctors warned me it would get me in the end,
translation.zh: 医生警告说这最后会害死我

translation.en: so I planned ahead, that's all.
translation.zh: 我只是事先做好准备而已

translation.en: The cat eats tuna twice a day
and likes to do his business in private.
translation.zh: 而且喜欢躲起来大小便

translation.en: We remember before you this day...
Just a remembrance of some sort...
for those people who thought I pulled my weight.
translation.zh: 为了觉得我有所贡献的人

translation.en: A local hero and good friend of the show is being remembered today.
translation.zh: 缅怀一名本地英雄 以及本节目的好朋友

translation.en: Jimmy, would you like to say a few words about Otto?
translation.zh: 吉米 你想说几句话纪念奥托吗？
好的 奥托 我们爱你 为了纪念你

translation.en: In your honor, Malcolm and I are doing
translation.zh: 奥托 我们爱你 为了纪念你 我和马尔坎铁打不动地替你巡逻社区

translation.en: all of your rounds without fail around lunch and on weekdays.
translation.zh: 我和马尔坎铁打不动地替你巡逻社区 午休时间和工作日

translation.en: [Otto] My lawyer will give you access to my bank accounts.
translation.zh: （安息 爷爷） 我的律师会让你用我的银行账户

translation.en: I never wasted money on crap,
so you'll have enough to get the children through school.
translation.zh: 你会有足够的钱让小孩念完书

translation.en: And do what you like with the rest.
translation.zh: （索妮娅安德森青少年危机基金） 剩下的钱由你支配

translation.en: [Otto] The house, and everything in it, is yours,
translation.zh: 房子和里面的一切都是你的

translation.en: so long as you promise never to sell it to those real estate bastards.
translation.zh: 只要你保证不把它卖给那些开发商混蛋
别让汤米开那辆雪佛兰

translation.en: Or anyone else, for that matter.
I'm trusting it with you alone.
Because you are not an idiot.

translation.zh: （若您或身边的人遇到心理困扰请求助） （美国境内：拨打988全天候保密免费危机情感疏导）
